name: Keep Breathing (PachachoStudios)
description:
In this game you have to experience one day in the life of a kid whose life isn't easy.

We recommend you to play with an xbox controller.

Controls

Breath - LT or Left Click

Move - Left Joystick or WASD 

Jump - A button or Space

Game Developed in 48 hour at the GamesUPM GameJam of 2019.

By:

Ángel González (@agonesc)
Javier Creis (@CreisJavier)
Mauro Rodríguez (@MauVGames)
Adrián González (@irx99)
